explains: adj. 安慰的；令人欣慰的
v. 安慰（comfort 的 ing 形式）

sentences.en: On a more personal level, a friend may be upset and need comforting.
sentences.cn: 在更私人的层面上，朋友可能会感到不安，需要安慰。

sentences.en: If only poor grandmother could hear those comforting words every day!
sentences.cn: 要是可怜的奶奶每天都能听到这些安慰的话该多好啊！

sentences.en: Within hours of arriving in Angola, television screens around the World were filled with images of her comforting victims injured in explosions caused by landmines.
sentences.cn: 在她抵达安哥拉后的几个小时内，世界各地的电视屏幕上都是她安慰在地雷爆炸中受伤的受害者的画面。
